title: Bachelor's Degrees in the United States
question_text:
Chances are, since you are studying AP Statistics, you plan to earn at least a bachelor's degree from college. According to the U.S. Census Bureau, $29\%$ of Americans age $25\text{ years}$ or older have already earned a bachelor's or more advanced degree. You decide to randomly select $58\text{ adults}$ over the age of $25$ to ask if they have earned at least a bachelor's degree.
Describe the sampling distribution of the proportion of respondents who have earned at least a bachelor's degree.

choices.text:
